name: Amarie Stitt
text: I love the Learning Ladder! They kind of treat me like family. Its different environment then my old summer camp. I like most of the children and all of the teachers are nice.

name: Timothy Smith
text: Good fundamentals being installed at the center. If you're looking for good morals, this is the place!

name: Ashley Nathan
text: I have been associated with this business for several years. Its an awesome experience in my life.

name: Tymmekia Miller
text: My son was also injured at this daycare, there are no two sides to a story when it comes to a child who can not speak. please be careful in choosing a daycare with workers and a owner who actually care about your child's safety and health.

name: Sandra Dee
text: The Learning Ladder is an exceptional Childcare facility that enriches the growth and learning structure of children. I am extremely pleased with the personal care and concern that they share for my little one.

name: Stephanie Carson
text: Just saw on facebook that a child was scratched up by a teacher there.  Please follow up to this situation before putting your children here. Their are always two sides to a story but I would investigate before enrollment.

name: Birmingham tours
text: My son was assaulted there by the owner would not recommend this to any parent

name: msaprilp
text: Awesome daycare!!!!! Great learning environment and the staff is very friendly!!!

name: Jessika Crooker
text: I have no choice but to put my kids in this school as they need learning in a school system . the teachers are amazing but the staff dealing with paper work has made me lose my mind i have turned EVERYTHING in the school year before. then as soon as they started i was argued with called a lier basically that i didnt turn things in when i KNOW I DID and its happened about 2 3 times and they refused to give me a paper stating I returned them in and all my kids have what they need in their files. so they can yet again tell me I didnt turn everything in when they lose it.  Then they make you have dental records and then have you sign a paper for them to get dental exams in school no im NOT signing those papers if they need dental check ups I WILL take them myself as i do.  There not bad people sweet staff but VERY frustrating when you have enough at home to deal with thinking everything is fine on one end and turn around and its not.

name: Bree Van De Kamp
text: Well for starters, the building is old and outdated. Some of the teacher's don't teach well. Some of the staff is very unprofessional and non-attentive to the kids.
